title: File a Trademark Application
description: An IP paralegal needs to file a new trademark application with the USPTO for a client's new product name.

tasks.description: Conduct a knockout search of the USPTO database to ensure the proposed trademark is not already in use.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the mark appears to be available.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary information for the application, including the owner's name, the mark itself, the goods/services it applies to, and a specimen showing the mark in use.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all required data and files.

tasks.description: Complete and file the application through the USPTO's online portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the trademark application.
